data.message: syco's leave Eminem alone cause that's the way he is ... has his own  mind and is against Trump ... and he does that all his life give his own opinion about stuff he don't like and if fans don't like him for that  than fuck of   cause he doesn't matter what others think about  him and it sounds pathetic cause  people are not his fan anymore cause Eminem doesn't stand behind Trump which most people of the world  doesn't do ... and here in Holland we are allowed to say our own opinion without   judging ... like you Americans do ...Trump is no President to be proud of ... he is just a joker who thinks he can save the world ... poor lonely man ...with no gouvernement ... cause noone want work for  that  fool  Trump ...

replies.message: ThnX ... there are 2 persons ; marshall mather and Em Emine who ask fans for money . to donate for ''orphans'' in west afrrica .. I guess it are fak ones .
